SEARCH
Module help
Package help

Class Step2Controller

java.lang.Object
help.Step2Controller
public class Step2Controller extends Object
Controller class responsible for handling the actions of Step 2 in the cashier multi-step process.

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initializes the view by setting up the movie selection and session data. Adds a listener to update the selected session label when a session is selected.

    • loadSessionData

      private void loadSessionData(Movie selectedMovie)
      Loads session data for the selected movie and populates the session table.
      Parameters:
      selectedMovie - The movie for which session data will be loaded.

    • handleNextButtonAction

      private void handleNextButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the action for the Next button, navigating to the next step in the process.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered when the Next button is clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while loading the next FXML file.

    • handleBackButtonAction

      private void handleBackButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the action for the Back button, navigating back to Step 1.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered when the Back button is clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while loading the FXML file for Step 1.

    • updateSelectedMovie

      public void updateSelectedMovie(Movie movie)
      Updates the selected movie in Step 1 by setting the movie title in the label.
      Parameters:
      movie - The selected movie to be displayed.

    • handleConfirmSelection

      private void handleConfirmSelection() throws IOException
      Handles the confirmation of the selected session, saving the session to the cart and showing a confirmation dialog.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the confirmation process.

    • showConfirmationDialog

      private void showConfirmationDialog()
      Displays a confirmation dialog when the session is successfully selected.

    • showErrorDialog

      private void showErrorDialog(String errorMessage)
      Displays an error dialog with the provided error message.
      Parameters:
      errorMessage - The error message to be displayed in the dialog.

    • getNextStepFXML

      private String getNextStepFXML(Session selectedSession)
      Determines the next step's FXML file based on the selected session's hall.
      Parameters:
      selectedSession - The session for which the next step is being determined.
      Returns:
      The FXML file path for the next step, based on the selected session's hall.

    • handleSignOutButtonAction

      private void handleSignOutButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action for the Sign Out button, signing the user out and navigating to the login screen.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered when the Sign Out button is clicked.
